title: AI-act proposal by the Council 06/12/2022
subtitle: Proposal for a Regulation of the European Parliament and of the Council laying down harmonised rules on artificial intelligence (Artificial Intelligence Act) and amending certain Union legislative acts - General approach (6 December 2022)
description: Pdf version of the amendments put forth by the Council: The general approach establishes the Council's provisional position on this proposal, and forms the basis for the preparations for the negotiations with the European Parliament.
